Should I also remove the field from the database? Or should it stay in there?

I'm 80% in favour of removing it. The remaining 20% are doubts about mingling with existing ApplicationDraft records. otoh, we do have the lodged Application with all data and past students aren't able to browser their old draft anyway. So yeah, let's remove it!

body:
> Should I also remove the field from the database? Or should it stay in there?

I'm 80% in favour of removing it. The remaining 20% are doubts about mingling with existing `ApplicationDraft` records. otoh, we do have the lodged `Application` with all data and past students aren't able to browser their old draft anyway. So yeah, let's remove it!
